import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-slick' import ava01 from '../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg' import ava02 from '../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg' import ava03 from '../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg' const Testimonials = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, autoplay: true, speed: 1000, swipeToSlide: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, slideToShow: 3, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slideToShow: 2, slideToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slideToShow: 1, slideToScrol: 1, } } ] } return
